views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 7 to 13

Have you ever wondered why your favorite social apps don't allow you to download videos / photos or even the new stories ?? well don't wonder because Social Downloader is what you need; You can finally download videos from facebook and save them to camera roll , download stories (photo or video and even share them) download videos and photos from instagram + the ability to share them , download whatsapp's story photos and videos + share them! And finally you can also Download GIF videos from twitter!

how it works ?
In whatsapp story u will be greeted with a save button on the left bottom corner of the story.
In facebook enter the video full screen and hold in order to save the video or share.
In facebook story press the camera button on the right bottom corner.
In instagram feed double tap on photo or video.
In instagram stories press the three small dots on the bottom right of the screen.
In twitter enter the status of the GIF video and long hold.
To Do list :
add twitter Videos.

In order to save from twitter enter the status you want and long hold on the video view

This tweak works best on ios 10 and 9.
Respring after making changes and enjoy!

Press apply changes after messing in preferences.
Don't update the apps when an update is available unless you hear from me on twitter @eliassfeir1

Support latest versions of Facebook and Instagram Support apps latest version

Fix instagram story crash
Social Downloader is now free
Fixed bugs and crashes
Have new plans for youtube in the next update
Supports A12 devices
Long press on facebook story in order to save now
Press the share button on twitter video from timeline
Facebook feed videos press the three dots (more options) in full screen mode
Fixed Settings toggles (Preferences)
Fixed youtube downloads
Added basic snapchat support (might cause ban use it on your own risk)
fixed youtube downloading for iOS 11 and lower (iOS 12 version still not working due to rocketboostrap not working on iOS 12)


added basic iOS 12 support Fixed twitter crash in order to save videos now all you need to do is to click the share button on the video from the timeline feed and save Fixed bugs and SOME problems in Snapchat

Fixed facebook stories download Fixed Youtube crash on latest version.
Fixed settings ON/OFF toggles.


Support iOS 11.
You can now download video clip songs from youtube , youtube disabled it so I created my own. Press the download button next to like and share to download and choose your preferred quality.
Long tap on the video view in order to download audio only.
Fixed a problem with twitter in order to download enter the tweet with the video and long press on the video view
Fixed a crash when saving whatsapp story and now you can save stories by pressing on the three dots button on the up right corner.
Bug Fixes Fixed instagram crash Added a Save button top right when viewing stories on instagram that allows you to download them easily.
Fixed a bug when saving videos from instagram feed.
Added safari support ! Social Downloader auto detects direct download links in safari (audio and video) downloads them and saves them to music / gallery.


Fixed random crashes in Youtube.
Fixed twitter touch delay.


Added the ability to download from youtube long tap on the video view and choose download from audio only (audio gets saved to music library) to 144p all the way to 1440p
Added the ability to download from twitter just long tap on the twitter status and choose save.
Added a progress bar when downloading videos.

Social Downloader now depends on JODebox Added support for latest version of Tumblr


bug fixes + added the ability to share facebook feed photos outside facebook


Fixed a bug in facebook and allow the user to download either SD quality or HD quality.


Added the ability to download videos from tumblr ! just enter the video in fullscreen hold on the view and press save in order to save it in gallery.
Fixed bug in snapchat
